Chapter 27

Translator: Mosstree


Chapter 27: True Love Quiz Questions


WTF! Why had he slept together with Odd Trouble again ah?


Wei Han hurriedly touched his body, fortunately, it wasn’t bare. He turned his waist, it also didn’t hurt. Hurriedly, he ran to the toilet to check his front and back, and also didn’t find anything wrong. Finally, he was relieved.


Just out of the bathroom, Wei Han lifted his head and saw Qi Zhifan’s silent face.


“Hehe, good morning.”


“I’m not good.”


Qi Zhifan said coldly. God knows how hard it was for him to endure and hold Wei Han for a night. Although he hadn’t touch Wei Han below, but he’d very happily nibbled above.


In fact, Wei Han hadn’t escaped unscathed: the slightly swollen lips were Qi Zhifan’s masterpiece.


While washing his face and brushing his teeth, Wei Han looked in the mirror for a while and said to himself, “Ahh? My mouth…strange, did I eat something exciting yesterday?”


Qi Zhifan laughed but didn’t speak.


Every time the final exams came around, the university library practically filled up with students. In addition to the always-studying top students, there were also a pile of cramming learning dregs.


Wei Han specially went to the Finance Faculty Department of Management Library, originally thinking of running into Chu Chuanyao there. But unexpectedly, he ran into Jiang Chengrui, who was sneaking around.


“Hey, Little Jiang, what are you looking at?” Wei Han was a little puzzled. Jiang Chengrui was obviously not looking at a criminal investigation book.


Jiang Chengrui tried to cover it up, hiding the two books in his hand behind his back. “Not…not looking at anything.”


Seeing him cover it up, perhaps it was something too embarrassing to say. Wei Han also wasn’t interested in prying into other people’s privacy and didn’t continue to pursue.


“Little Jiang, I’m sorry about the matter yesterday! I just went to the toilet, when who knew, Qi Zhifan suddenly came out and just took me away. Right, after that, I called you, but you didn’t answer. Then, I sent you a text. Did you see it?”


Jiang Chengrui nodded and pulled Wei Han into the corner, then whispered, “Silly Han, yesterday I…actually didn’t come home.”


“Ah? What happened?”


Jiang Chengrui’s face showed a difficult expression, and hesitatingly said, “I…with that pervert…slept all night.”


Wei Han immediately stared wide-eyed. Shocked, he said, “Slept all night? Sharing the same bed?”


“Shh, lower your voice.” Jiang Chengrui hurriedly covered Wei Han’s mouth and nodded helplessly, “Yeah, I guess so. Yesterday, that group of people kept pouring drinks for me. I couldn’t drink too much and ended up getting drunk.”


Fuck! Could it be so fucking coincidental? Wei Han couldn’t help but think of himself and Qi Zhifan.


“Then you two…did you do ‘that’?”


“I’m also not sure. I was drunk, so I wanted to check some books.” Jiang Chengrui scratched his head, and then brought out the books he’d hidden behind his back to show Wei Han.


Wei Han stared at him. Unexpectedly, they were actually books on homosexuality. Suddenly, his cheeks couldn’t help from drawing out.


It turned out that Jiang Chengrui, this straight guy, was researching the male-male aspect of knowledge ah. This was definitely the rhythm of getting bent.


Wei Han patted Jiang Chengrui’s shoulder and earnestly said, “Little Jiang, if you don’t understand anything in this area, you can directly ask me because I’m…”


Jiang Chengrui frightened, took a step back and interrupted him, “Silly Han! So you like men too? Looking at your appearance, you definitely must be pressed underneath.”


Wei Han’s face pulled once again, “…Little Jiang, I’m a gong.”


“You don’t look like it at all. Have you pressed anyone down?”


“……”


Wei Han was suddenly a little speechless.


“Don’t discuss this. Little Jiang, is your waist sore? What about your legs? Behind your butt…uh, does it hurt?” Wei Han asked, deeply concerned.


Jiang Chengrui shook his head. “When I woke up, except for my head being a little dizzy, everything else was normal.”


“Then you’re alright.”


Wei Han breathed a sigh of relief and smiled. It seemed that although Pei Yuyang was quite a perverted, silly man, but he wasn’t really a beast.


“Silly Han, tell me honestly: do you have a man that you like now?” His problem temporarily solved, Jiang Chengrui began to wonder about Wei Han again.


“Yes,” Wei Han answered without hesitation.


“Then, there’s a true love quiz at the back of this book. Let me quiz you on it.”


“Okay,” Wei Han nodded and agreed.


Jiang Chengrui first asked a few common questions about what color the love interest likes, what style of music he listens to, and then what kind of reaction he has when he receives messages, gifts, and so on from the person he liked.


“Has he ever acted as “hero saves the beauty” for you?” Jiang Chengrui asked again.


“This…” Wei Han turned his eyes and tried to figure it out for a while. In his past life, he’d done this several times for Chu Chuanyao, but Chu Chuanyao had never done it for him… In comparison, Qi Zhifan seemed to have ‘saved’ him many times.


The first time was when he went to watch an animation movie with Jiang Chengrui and Little Yi, and at that time, Qi Zhifan and Lu Yan hadn’t broken up yet. In the theater toilet, he’d caused a big misunderstanding and was kicked by Jiang Chengrui, who’d thought he was a bad person. In the end, Qi Zhifan carried him to the hospital for the first time.


And, after the fighting incident near Chengyu College, when he came out of the police station, he almost fell down the steps. At that time, Qi Zhifan acted as his meat shield, and protected him all along.


Then at the exams, he fainted from a fever, and it was still Qi Zhifan who carried him to the school’s hospital…


“There’s a ‘he’ who actually helped me several times,” Wei Han truthfully replied.


“Oh, then did you ever experience running home together in the rain?” Jiang Chengrui continued to ask.


“……” Wei Han blanked once again. Wasn’t this also together with Qi Zhifan! Because he was drenched in rain the day before, he’d caught a cold and became fevered the next day.


“Silly Han, in the end, was there ah?”


‘Yes,” Wei Han weakly said.


“Have you ever had a romantic candle light dinner together?”


Wei Han: “Yes.”


Last night, just ate with Qi Zhifan.


“Then, you were drunk, was he the one who sent you home?”


“…Yes.”


“Have you ever quarreled before? To the point of getting physical?”


“Yes.”


“Have you slept in the same bed?”


“Yeah.”


No longer struggling, Wei Han resigned himself to nodding once again.


Jiang Chengrui was scared. “Ah? Silly Han, then is your innocence still there?”


“Of course, it was just simply sleeping,” Wei Han explained in a loud voice, lest Jiang Chengrui misunderstood something.


He also seemed to have slept with Qi Zhifan twice, but really, nothing happened ah. After all, they were both brothers.


Also, why did these quiz questions always made him think of Odd Trouble? Shouldn’t it be his Little Yao?


This rhythm was obviously wrong!


Jiang Chengrui touched his chin and revealed an ‘understood it all’ expression. Finally, he summed it up, “Silly Han, when you find such a good man, congratulations, you can marry him.”


Wei Han: “……”


Then one week later, S Uni’s students forged ahead into exam week. After the end of exam week, each major began to let out for vacation.


With Wei Han’s help, Jiang Chengrui was able to narrowly survive the theoretical exam for the first half of the semester and didn’t flunk. Because of his family’s economic situation and not wanting to let sister Jiang Chenghui work too hard, Jiang Chengrui didn’t stay idle. His vacation was lined up with work, with occasional days of rest in between.


Seeing his favorite person working so hard, Pei Yuyang was so anxious his heart, spleen, lungs and kidneys all hurt thoroughly. Also, he worried till he had a white hair, and wished he could immediately carry Jiang Chengrui home and love him dearly in bed!


But Jiang Chengrui’s temperament was very stubborn, and the two people didn’t have a true and definitive relationship. Pei Yuyang naturally couldn’t make him change his mind, and was forced to secretly use money to bribe all the people and relations. He called the many bosses Jiang Chengrui worked for, and had them only give Jiang Chengrui easy work with better pay. Also, out of the seven days in the week, he should have four days off.


On this day, it happened that Jiang Chengrui was free, and then Pei Yuyang invited him to come out. When Jiang Chengrui agreed, Pei Yuyang excitedly hugged his family’s Archie and twirled him around several times until the pig became dizzy before he stopped.


However, when Pei Yuyang drove to meet Jiang Chengrui, his brows trembled. Jiang Chengrui stood with three other peopleーWei Han, Qi Zhifan, and Chu Chuanyao.


Pei Yuyang: “……”


Pa-ta! He seemed to hear the sound of his own broken heart, farewell “enjoying the world of only two people”!


In fact, Jiang Chengrui had a hunch that, as a single man, staying alone with Pei Yuyang was far from good, so he’d pulled Wei Han along. With Young Master Pei inviting them to eat, drink and be merry for free, Wei Han was also very happy, and he called up Chu Chuanyao to play together. It happened that Chu Chuanyao also agreed.


At this time, Qi Zhifan couldn’t sit still. Thinking about how he couldn’t stand for Wei Han and Chu Chuanyao to be bound by deep emotions, he also naturally followed.


A group of five people first climbed the mountain. On the very steep slope, there was slippery moss on the stone. Pei Yuyang originally wanted to pull Jiang Chengrui up, but Jiang Chengrui behind him was lithe as a swallow, and his hands and feet were also agile, so he climbed up in one go. He also forcibly pulled Pei Yuyang up.


Qi Zhifan stretched out his hand, also wanting to pull up Wei Han who was behind him. However, his hand remained empty for half a day, and he never saw Wei Han move to hold it. Looking back, he realized that Wei Han had ignored him and was entirely focused on Chu Chuanyao, helping Chu Chuanyao to carefully climb up.


At noon, the five people sat down for a picnic. Most of the food was prepared by Chef Wei Han. There were sandwiches, sushi, salads, ham, smoked fish, salted duck, and so on. Among them were marinated beancurd and homemade kimchi, both of which Chu Chuanyao loved to eat, and were also specially prepared by Wei Han for him alone.


Seeing Wei Han always close next to Chu Chuanyao with a smile, Jiang Chengrui and Pei Yuyang suddenly understood some things.


Qi Zhifan stared coldly at Wei Han’s face that was looking at Chu Chuanyao with what resembled first love, and the pent-up frustrations in his chest continued to linger, not scattering.


In the afternoon, the open-air hot springs was filled with steam hanging in the air. Qi Zhifan and Pei Yuyang were together and soaking in the hot springs. It was clearly a moment to enjoy and relax, but Pei Yuyang saw that Qi Zhifan’s brows were deeply locked with a displeased appearance.


“Hey, Ah Fan, are you unhappy ah? I’m also a bit unhappy. You say, everyone is a man, how good would it be to soak together. But Curlie had to reject me.”


Pei Yuyang was somewhat resentful. Next door to them were Wei Han and Jiang Chengrui. Because Chu Chuanyao was a little tired, so he went to the hotel room first to take a nap and didn’t come with them.


Qi Zhifan shot him a disdainful look. Wasn’t this pervert just thinking of looking at the other person’s body?


But then he thought of Wei Han’s naked appearance, and he…he really wanted to see it too.


“Ah Fan, I think Wei Han and Chu Chuanyao walked very close. The two of them…” Suddenly, Pei Yuyang thought of this and intended to ask Qi Zhifan.


Who knew, the next moment, Qi Zhifan took a towel and with a steady face, stood up and prepared to leave.


“Hey, I haven’t finished yet,” Pei Yuyang said anxiously.


Qi Zhifan waved his hand. “Then you can slowly speak to the air.”


On the other side of the partition, Wei Han also came out of the pool. “Little Jiang, I’ve soaked well. I’m getting out first and going to drink something.”


Jiang Chengrui replied, “Mm, go ahead. I’ll come out right away.”


When Wei Han went outside, Qi Zhifan also just directly walked in. His bare upper body made Wei Han simply unable to move his eyes. No matter how many times he saw it, his brother’s figure really made people envious.


Qi Zhifan looked up, and seeing Wei Han, his gloomy mood also somewhat eased. He moved his lips, but hadn’t had time to speak when unexpectedly, Wei Han’s feet suddenly slipped and he rushed straight towards him.


Fearing Wei Han would fall, Qi Zhifan stepped forward to hold him, but he was still a step late. With a “boom“, Wei Han laid flat on the floor, and the white bath towel that had been around Qi Zhifan’s waist…was also accidentally pulled down by him.
